name: Ja-Smartlife
0:
”Alexa, Turn on Bedroom light”
”Alexa, Turn on Bedtime”
”Alexa, What's the temperature in the living room ?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Easily control your Ja-Smartlife Home Automation devices with your voice.
Turn on your plugs, bulbs, in-wall relays and dimmers. Play any scenes you created. Check the temperature in each room where you installed your temperature sensors. 
So now you can control lightings, power plugs, entertainment systems and appliances with Alexa.
Our Home automation system connects your sensors and devices to a central gateway and let you control them through mobile app, web and Alexa.
